About Me

My programming journey...

I have always been a problem solver at heart. Although my professional path has taken many twists and turns — from retail to the hospitality industry where I delivered over the top service at Disney's Grand California Hotel and Spa, to troubleshooting Saas software and payment gateway systems — I've never stopped engaging my passion to help others and solve problems.

As a front-end developer, I use my tenacious attention to detail, my passion for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to make a difference in people's lives. That's why I’m excited to make a big impact at a high growth company.

Deluxe Brand Marketing

Junior Web Developer

I designed a streamlined javascript environment for multiple real estate marketing applications. I implemented custom HTML email templates in a Node.js and AWS environment for weekly email marketing campaigns utilized by hundreds of clients.

Cornerstone Payment Systems

Front End Developer

I created responsive e-commerce interfaces in a custom PHP template platform. I analyzed the performance and stability of the user interfaces to improve web traffic.

Cornerstone Merchant Services

Technical Support Agent

I assisted 1,000+ merchant locations with personalized training and support remotely via phone and email. I rectified customer issues with WordPress plugins and company payment gateway API. I designed and maintained UI for customer's e-commerce pages.
